question: India's first design university 'World University of Design' opens in ____________.
explanation: World University of Deisgn (WUD), India's first and only Design University opened its campus at Sonipat, Haryana. The World University of Design is promoted by Om Parkash Bansal Educational and Social Welfare Trust of Mandi Gobindgarh, Punjab. WUD offers 23 specialized UG and PG programs in various fields like Design, Fashion, Communication, Visual Arts, Design and Retail Management, and Architecture. It is the first university in India dedicated to education in the creative domain. It has a well-facilitated residential campus.
